<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_cicd_spoke.CICDFlowUtil</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Utility class used by CICD flow actions to perform common actions</description>
        <name>CICDFlowUtil</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var CICDFlowUtil = Class.create();
CICDFlowUtil.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
		this.API_BASE_URL = '/api/sn_cicd/';
    },
	
	getAPIVersionPath: function(apiVersionParameter) {		
		if (global.JSUtil.nil(apiVersionParameter))
			return this.API_BASE_URL;
		
		return this.API_BASE_URL + apiVersionParameter + '/';
	},

    type: 'CICDFlowUtil'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>maint</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-03-22 19:39:25</sys_created_on>

        <sys_name>CICDFlowUtil</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery (CICD) Spoke" source="sn_cicd_spoke">70fae9692b1c0200c5244f74b4da15d3</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
